Mercury::Field

Mercury::Field Struct Reference

#include <packet.hpp>

Public Attributes

char * beg_
uint16 len_

Detailed Description

This type is used to track regions of data on a packet.

The packet type is fairly opaque (i.e. just a chunk of bytes in the data array) and without these things it's kinda hard to extract stuff out of the packet data after it has been streamed on.
